Package helper

Class CustomerDao

java.lang.Object
helper.CustomerDao
public class CustomerDao extends Object
This class will allow us to have a CRUD setup for our customers table.

  • Method Details

    • getAllCustomers

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Customer> getAllCustomers() throws SQLException, Exception
      This method allows us to get all customers. A list allCustomers has been created. Iterating through our customers table we will store each row into an customerResult. The result will also be added to our allCustomers list.
      Returns:
      allCustomers Returns all of the customers from our customers table
      Throws:
      SQLException
      Exception

    • getCustomer

      public static Customer getCustomer(String Customer_Name) throws SQLException, Exception
      This method retrieves a single customer. A String value is passed to the Customer_Name parameter which is then used in the sql query to retrieve the specific row based on the Customer_Name given. The customer information is then stored in customerResult.
      Parameters:
      Customer_Name - The Customer_Name
      Returns:
      customerResult returns the customerResult
      Throws:
      SQLException
      Exception

    • UpdateCustomer

      public static void UpdateCustomer(javafx.event.ActionEvent event, int Customer_ID, String CustomerName, String CustomerAddress, String CustomerPhoneNumber, String CustomerPostalCode, String CustomerCountry, String CustomerState, int DivisionID) throws SQLException
      This method updates an existing customer. An update query is used to pass our parameter information to update an existing customer in our customers table.
      Parameters:
      Customer_ID - For Customer_ID
      CustomerName - For CustomerName
      CustomerAddress - For CustomerAddress
      CustomerPhoneNumber - For CustomerPhoneNumber
      CustomerPostalCode - For CustomerPostalCode
      CustomerCountry - For CustomerCountry
      CustomerState - For CustomerState
      DivisionID - For Division_ID
      Customer_ID - For Customer_ID
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • DeleteCustomer

      public static void DeleteCustomer(javafx.event.ActionEvent event, int Customer_ID) throws SQLException
      This method processes a customer deletion. An integer value is passed to Customer_ID which then is used in our sql query to delete the appointment matching our Customer_ID, once the appointment is deleted, the customer record can be removed. This is due to FK constraints.
      Parameters:
      Customer_ID - The Customer_ID
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • CreateCustomerRecord

      public static void CreateCustomerRecord(javafx.event.ActionEvent event, String CustomerName, String CustomerAddress, String CustomerPhoneNumber, String CustomerPostalCode, String CustomerCountry, String CustomerState, int DivisionID) throws SQLException
      This method creates a customer record record. An insert query is created to insert our parameter values to our customers table.
      Parameters:
      CustomerName - For CustomerName
      CustomerAddress - For CustomerAddress
      CustomerPhoneNumber - For CustomerPhoneNumber
      CustomerPostalCode - For CustomerPostalCode
      CustomerCountry - For CustomerCountry
      CustomerState - For CustomerState
      DivisionID - For Division_ID
      Throws:
      SQLException
